Verses: 1 raajaavaagiya Agaasveru Dhesaththinmelum, Samuththiraththilulla Theevugalinmelum, Pagudhi Erpaduththinaan.

2 vallamaiyum Paraakkiramamumaana Avanudaiya Ellaa Seygaigalum, Raajaa Periyavanaakkina Mordhegaayinudaiya Menmaiyin Virththaandhamum, Medhiyaa Persiyaa Raajaakkalin Nadapadi Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.

3 yoodhanaagiya Mordhegaai Raajaavaagiya Agaasveruvukku Irandaavadhaanavanum, Yoodharukkul Periyavanum, Than Thiralaana Sagodhararukkup Piriyamaanavanumaayirundhadhum Andri Than Janangaludaiya Nanmaiyai Naadi, Than Kulaththaarukkellaam Samaadhaanamundaagap Pesugiravanumaayirundhaan.
